channel.title: about on Liam Elliott
channel.description: Recent content in about on Liam Elliott

item.title: Welcome
item.description: It’s time to stop procrastinating… For many years now I’ve spoken on many occasions with colleagues about the importance of keeping a blog, even tonight I interviewed Thiago Passos for SSW TV on his last year or so (still waiting for it to be published), and how he has been working on building his profile, both as a blogger and as a speaker. In closing the interview, I promised Thiago I’d write my first post, and now I’m out of excuses.
